body:
## What's Changed
* Add a pretty-printer for the Cimple+Apidsl AST. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/2
* Add CODEOWNERS and settings.yml files. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/3
* cleanup: Remove the syntax for multi-declarators. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/4
* feat: Tighten the style on comments. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/5
* chore: Remove travis; add cirrus ci. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/6
* chore: Upgrade to ghc-8.10.3 by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/7
* perf: Use StrictData for all modules that define data types. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/8
* fix: Ensure `#define` expressions are always parenthesised. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/9
* feat: Add support for `static_assert`. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/10
* feat: Allow naked sizeof to appear as macro body. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/11
* cleanup: Enforce for loop consistency. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/12
* cleanup: Require `{}` around all switch case statements. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/13
* feat: Add support for parsing whole programs. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/14
* feat: Implement include-graph tool. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/15
* feat: Support compound literals. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/17
* feat: Initial implementation of second tree-parse pass. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/18
* fix: Recurse into `#if/ifdef/ifndef`. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/19
* cleanup: Make parser implementation details private. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/20
* fix: Add missing pretty printer for LicenseDecl. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/21
* feat: Add support for attaching attributes to nodes. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/22
* fix: Add missing Node to Attr. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/23
* cleanup: Wrap all compound statements in CompoundStmt. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/24
* cleanup: Store the current file in the call stack. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/25
* refactor: Generalised traverseAst to include mapAst. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/26
* refactor: Use fixpoint y combinator for the AST. by @iphydf in https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/pull/27


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/TokTok/hs-cimple/compare/v0.0.1...v0.0.6
name: v0.0.6
